text: Hello All, has anyone tried connecting GPT to chatflows via webhooks/public apps?

Hi Varun,

To add a drag and drop field in a HubSpot form, follow these steps. First, go to the form editor and click on the "Add a field" button. Next, select the "Drag and drop" field type. Drag the field to the desired position on the form, and customize its label and properties. You can use this user-friendly drag and drop field to collect various types of information from your visitors. With your five years of experience in HubSpot, you should find this process familiar and easy to implement in your forms.
